name: Random Chords Generator
description: I had just discovered javascript's browser API 'BaseAudioContext' and oscillators stuff, but I'm not that good on musical theory, so that's the product of that. Still, I think it's cool that I did no require audio files.
short_description: Generates random chords and a melody.
instructions: Click on the <kbd>Genera giro di accordi</kbd> button to generate a series of repeating chords. Check the <kbd>Genera melodia</kbd>  button to also generate a random melody based on the chords.
